name: Perf Regression Triage (v1)
description: Lightweight eval for compiler/CPU perf regression triage reasoning (hypotheses, measurements, experiments).

criteria: Actionability: suggests concrete next steps (counters, flags, experiments).
Scientific rigor: controls, confounders, baselines, reproducibility.
Compiler + microarchitecture awareness: relevant details and interactions.

cases.prompt: A tight loop became 12% slower after switching from clang-16 to clang-18 on the same Ice Lake server. Provide a triage plan.
A regression appears only with -O3 and disappears with -fno-vectorize. Provide hypotheses and experiments.
Performance regresses only on Zen 4 but not on Skylake. Provide a structured investigation plan.
A workload slows down with PGO enabled. Provide measurements and experiments to isolate root cause.
